lemma dec_unclocked: "(evaluate_dec False mn env s d (s',r) \<longrightarrow> (r \<noteq> Rerr (Rabort Rtimeout_error)) \<and> (clock s) = (clock s')) \<and> (evaluate_dec False mn env (s (| clock := count1 |)) d ((s' (| clock := count1 |)),r) \<longrightarrow> evaluate_dec False mn env (s (| clock := count2 |)) d ((s' (| clock := count2 |)),r))"
